input: The Chief Election Commissioner of India holds office for a period of

options.B: during the pleasure of the President
options.C: for 6 years or till the age of 65 years, whichever is earlier
options.D: for 5 years or till the age of 60 years, whichever is earlier

explanation: The Chief Election Commissioner holds office for a term of six years or until they attain the age of 65 years, whichever is earlier.
